sentence.text: Despite extensive research on cancer stem cells in colorectal cancer, the negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II of stem cell markers on patient survival remains unclear, particularly in those with distant metastasis.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: In this study, we focused on colon cancer with peritoneal metastasis and investigated the association between the expression of CD133, aldehyde dehydrogenase-1 (oxidation-reduction process) and leucine-rich repeating G-protein coupled receptor-5 (positive regulation of canonical Wnt signaling pathway), and disease prognosis.

entity.text: positive regulation of canonical Wnt signaling pathway
